localization.letters: Each guess must be a valid 5 letter word. Hit the enter button to submit.
localization.colors: After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
localization.e1Caption: The letter 'W' is in the word and in the correct spot.
localization.e2Caption: The letter 'U' is in the word but in the wrong spot.
localization.e3Caption: The letter 'E' is not in the word in any spot.
localization.daily: A new word will be available each day!
